info.description: Api to retrieve deposit accounts/contracts details with customer information for deposits maturing within 30 days for a specific business date or for the current date
info.title: Customer Deposits

get.summary: Retrieves deposit accounts/contracts details with customer information for deposits maturing within 30 days for a specific business date or for the current date

parameters.name: businessDate
parameters.description: Business snapshot date of the source data

parameters.name: useCurrentDate
parameters.description: Current Date flag for the Business date

parameters.name: termToMaturity
parameters.description: The integer value of the remaining term to the maturity date of the product.

accountClass.description: Indicates if account is commercial; retail or other

affluentSegment.description: The affluent bucket of total balance to identify customer segment

balance.description: Current balance of the account in reporting currency.

lcyBalance.description: Current balance in local currency of the contract

beneficiary.description: Beneficiary for the Letter of Credit

businessDate.description: Business snapshot date of the source data

contractBranchKey.description: Identifier field with no business meaning - Foreign key linking to Contract to Branch

contractBranchName.description: Branch name where Contract was created

contractEmployeeFullName.description: Full name of the employee associated with the Contract

contractEmployeeKey.description: Identifier field with no business meaning - Foreign key linking to Contract to Employee

contractEmployeeNumber.description: Employee number of the employee associated with the Contract

contractNumber.description: Contract number of specific savings; chequing; term deposit; loan, letter of credit, etc.

contractRegion.description: Region of the branch associated with the Contract

contractStatus.description: The status of the Contract. i.e Active, Closed, Dormant, Inactive etc

currency.description: The currency type for the contract.  Typically the standard ISO 3 character country code such as CAD; USD; EUR.

useCurrentDate.description: Current Date flag for the Business date

customerClosedThisMonth.description: A Yes/No flag indicating if the customer has been closed within a month of the business date

customerNewThisMonth.description: A Yes/No flag indication if the customer has been opened within a month of the business date

customerClass.description: The classification for the member either retail or commercial

customerNumber.description: The customer number or customer identification number

customerStartDate.description: Date Customer started with�the FI�(customer opened date)

fixedOrVariable.description: Indicates if contract interest rate is fixed or variable

generation.description: The generation gap to identify the suitable product for the group of customers

interestRate.description: The interest rate for the contract

interestRateGroup.description: Groups based on account�interest rate�- '0' -.50%; .50 - 1.00%; 1% - 3% etc.

interestRateIndex.description: Interest rate index Ex:Prime + 1.00. Usually configured on the banking system at the product level; defines the rate.

interestRateTypeDescription.description: Interest Rate Type Description - LD loans and deps.

interestRateVariance.description: The contract interest rate variance. Eg. Prime -.50. -.50 is the variance.

interestIncomeOrExpense.description: Daily interest for an contract on the business date; based on the balance and the rate. Negative if it's a demand contract; positive if it's a loan contract.

interestIncomeOrExpenseLcy.description: Daily interest in local currency for an contract on the business date; based on the balance and the rate. Negative if it's a demand contract; positive if it's a loan contract.

isClosedThisMonth.description: Yes/No flag indicating if the account was closed less than a month before the business date

isClosedToday.description: Yes/No flag indicating if the account was closed on the business date

isNewThisMonth.description: A Yes/No flag indicating if the account has been opened less than one month before the business date

isNewToday.description: A Yes/No flag indicating if the account has been opened on the business date

isSME.description: Indicates if the customer is small/medium/enterprise corporate (yes/no))

maritalStatus.description: Marital status of the customer such as single; married; divorced; separated

maturityDate.description: Date the loan or term account will mature

occupation.description: The working occupation of the customer.

overdrawnAmount.description: The amount the account is overdrawn

overdrawnAmountLcy.description: The amount the account is overdrawn in local currency

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency that the payment should be made on the loan contract

primaryCollateralCode.description: Primary collateral code for the loan account

primaryCollateralDescription.description: Primary collateral code for the loan account

productCode.description: The code used to identify the type of product the account represents.  This  code is the base for classifying products into  classifications; categories; groups and classes.

productDescription.description: The description of the product based on the product code

productType.description: A classification field for product which is typically less granular than product code

standardizedTerm.description: The term length of the product calculated in standard months. i.e. 12; 24; 36 ....60.  If the term length is not a standard number; this value is rounded to the nearest standard term. For example a 13 month term is rounded to 12 months.

statementDescription.description: Text description of the account that is printed on statements. i.e Vacation Account

term.description: Term Length (0;1;3;6;9;12;18;24;36;48;60;84) could be months; days; years - see term unit.

termInMonths.description: Term length converted to months. Calculated based on term and term Unit

termToMaturity.description: The integer value of the remaining term to the maturity date of the product.

termUnit.description: Unit of term length (days; months; years)

totalBalance.description: The sum of all deposit and loan balances

totalBalanceLcy.description: Total Balance Amount in local currency)

totalCharges.description: Amount that is charged for operation by customer

totalChargesLcy.description: Amount in local currency that is charged for operation by customer

totalDiscountLcy.description: Total Discount Amount in local currency

transferRate.description: The funds transfer rate for the account based on values from the Profitability Model

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
